Name: on_action
Doc:
The name of a function that is triggered when the download is initiated. All the parameters of that function are optional:
  • state (`State^`): state instance.
  • id (optional[str]): the identifier of the button.
  • action (optional[str]): the name of the action that provoked the change.

Name: auto
Doc: If True, the download starts as soon as the page is loaded.

Name: render
Doc: If True, the control is displayed. If False, the control is not displayed.

Name: bypass_preview
Doc: If False, allows the browser to try to show the content in a different tab. The file download is always performed.

Name: name
Doc: A name proposition for the file to save, that the user can change.
